1.content: Implement NIH SBIR/STTR Full Compliance Enforcement System (8 Layers)
1.details:
Layer 1: Mechanism config enforcement
Layer 2: NIH compliance system prompt
Layer 3: Section-specific validation
Layer 4: Automated compliance audit engine
Layer 5: FOA parsing
Layer 6: Claim control & tone enforcement
Layer 7: Audit trail
Layer 8: Dynamic agency alignment
